shortDescription: As per our earlier discussion, I'm going to drop you right on top of a Baumann Group security outpost some 20 klicks from the Dobrev's spaceport. You're going to have to capture the site and clear out its defenses. When the job's done, the Moderbjörn will use the complex's computers to drop the spaceport's defenses and remotely engage the Dobrev's docking clamps. I'd expect the OpFor's defenses to run heavy on this one, so I'd advise building your lance accordingly.
longDescription: We're almost there, {COMMANDER.FirstName}. Just one more push and the derelict is ours.

contractObjectiveList.title: Capture the Baumann Group Security Complex

objectiveList.title: Advance on the Baumann Group Security Complex
objectiveList.description: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

objectiveList.title: Eliminate Baumann Group Defenses
objectiveList.description: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.

objectiveList.title: Capture the Baumann Group Security Complex with Friendly 'Mechs
objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.

objectiveList.title: Hold Out as Baumann Group Mercenaries Counter Attack
objectiveList.description: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.

objectiveList.title: Pacify the Baumann Group Security Complex Base
objectiveList.description: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

objectiveList.title: Eliminate Baumann Group Reinforcements
objectiveList.description: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.

objectiveList.title: Eliminate Base Turrets
objectiveList.description: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.

dialogueContent.words:
Okay, Commander, I've set our lance down just outside the Baumann Group's visual range.

Defenses will probably run on the heavy side, so I'd recommend approaching with caution.
Yes, but not too much caution. We need to take the facility stat, so the Moderbjörn can lock down the Dobrev's docking clamps. This mission won't count for much if the ship runs off again.
Don't worry, Doc. We won't leave Momma Bear hanging, and we won't let the Dobrev escape. We can't—the rest of our mystery 'Mech is hidden away on that ship.

That's the theory, and we're going to investigate it. But first, we engage the clamps.

You know what to do, Commander. I'll leave you to it.
That's done it, Commander! I've gained access to the complex's computers and transferred control to the Moderbjörn.
////Thank you, Doctor. I have deactivated the spaceport's turrets and engaged the spaceport's docking clamps. The Dobrev won't be going anywhere without my permission.////
Hang on a second. I'm getting a comm message over an unknown channel. Baumann again, I'm sure, but… wait. Motherf— This can't be happening. It just… can't!
What is it, Meyer? Who do you have on the line?

The goddamned [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBlackWidow],Black Widow]], that's who! Did I miss something, Commander? When did our search for the Dobrev turn into a meet-and-greet with Natasha-effing-Kerensky?

You'd better put her through, Meyer. If there's one MechWarrior we don't wanna leave hanging, the Black Widow is it.

That goes for you too, Boss. Better get to the viewscreen, and you'd better do it now.
////Pick up the pieces of your lance and go, Commander. Our mission has failed.////
Bogeys on sensors!
[GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
[GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
Leopard inbound, Commander. I'll be touching down directly.
PLACEHOLDER
I've got eyes on the security complex, Commander. Take it, and we'll get this show on the road.
INCOMING TRANSMISSION.

You're quite persistent, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}.

Like a bad rash, I just can't seem to get rid of you.
I could crack the obvious joke about that, but it's just too easy.
What's coming for you is no laughing matter. I've hired a new kill team, Commander. They'll keep you company while my ground crew prepares the Dobrev for departure.
We've got new heat signatures, Commander! Incoming 'Mechs, assault-class!
Get on it, Commander, and take 'em out quick. We need to seize that security complex before the Dobrev is cleared to launch.
